forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As the soft morning light begins to disperse the remnants of the lingering fog, Downtown San Francisco awakens to a day that promises both warmth and clarity. Glistening under the sun, the city transforms, embodying a serene vibrancy with temperatures projected to flirt with the low seventies. The gentle southwest breeze carries a hint of salt and the secrets of the bay, while the sky remains mostly clear, allowing for expansive views of the iconic architecture—each building standing proud against a backdrop of cobalt blue. The pleasant warmth beckons one to shed layers, though a light sweater or jacket may be just the companion for the evening, as temperatures gracefully dip into the mid-fifties.

Today invites leisurely strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a visit to one of the many cafes where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the fragrance of baked goods. There’s an allure in taking time to sit among the bustle, watching life unfold with a gentle sip of your drink in hand. Whether it’s a midday excursion through the art-filled streets or an afternoon spent under the shade of a tree in one of the city's lush parks, the atmosphere is rich with possibility and warmth, radiating a tranquil yet lively charm that only San Francisco can offer.
